headline: Bernstein Raises Cigna Group (CI) PT Amid Anticipated 2026 Sector Recovery
summary: The Cigna Group (NYSE:CI) is one of the cheap S&P 500 stocks to invest in now. On January 6, Bernstein raised the firm’s price target on Cigna to $307 from $294 and kept a Market Perform rating on the shares. This decision was made as Bernstein anticipated a sector-wide turnaround for government Managed Care Organizations […]
